original_text: And when we came to Rome, the centurion delivered the prisoners to the captain of the guard: but Paul was suffered to dwell by himself with a soldier that kept him.
korean_text: 우리가 로마에 들어가니 바울에게는 자기를 지키는 한 군인과 함께 따로 있게 허락하더라

sentences.original_text: And when we came to Rome
to the captain of the guard
but Paul was suffered to dwell by himself
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 바울은 혼자 지낼 수 있도록 허락받았다

sentences.original_text: with a soldier that kept him
sentences.korean_translation: 그를 지키는 한 명의 군인과 함께
